channel.title: CVE Feed for Joomla! Project -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Joomla! Project -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-23751|2023-02-01T21:12:42.378Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 4.0.0 through 4.2.4. A missing ACL check allows non super-admin users to access com_actionlogs.

item.title: CVE-2023-23750|2023-02-01T21:12:36.067Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 4.0.0 through 4.2.6. A missing token check causes a CSRF vulnerability in the handling of post-installation messages.

item.title: CVE-2023-23755|2023-05-30T16:12:32.399Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 4.2.0 through 4.3.1. The lack of rate limiting allowed brute force attacks against MFA methods.

item.title: CVE-2023-23754|2023-05-30T16:12:44.475Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 4.2.0 through 4.3.1. Lack of input validation caused an open redirect and XSS issue within the new mfa selection screen.

item.title: CVE-2023-23752|2023-02-16T16:25:21.003Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 4.0.0 through 4.2.7. An improper access check allows unauthorized access to webservice endpoints.

item.title: CVE-2023-40626|2023-11-29T12:28:47.787Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: The language file parsing process could be manipulated to expose environment variables. Environment variables might contain sensible information.

item.title: CVE-2024-21726|2024-06-11T04:33:03.650Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: Inadequate content filtering leads to XSS vulnerabilities in various components.

item.title: CVE-2024-21722|2024-06-11T04:32:57.896Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: The MFA management features did not properly terminate existing user sessions when a user's MFA methods have been modified.

item.title: CVE-2024-21723|2024-06-11T04:33:02.745Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: Inadequate parsing of URLs could result into an open redirect.

item.title: CVE-2024-21724|2024-06-11T04:32:53.121Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: Inadequate input validation for media selection fields lead to XSS vulnerabilities in various extensions.

item.title: CVE-2024-21725|2024-06-11T04:32:47.531Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: Inadequate escaping of mail addresses lead to XSS vulnerabilities in various components.
